1.8.9.1.5.1:
New Features:
- Change Zealot Color (yes, chroma zealots are possible)
- Hide Sven Pup Nametags
- Zealot counter now has support for explosive bow (its not 100% accurate yet though, sorry!)
- Disable Enderman Teleportation Effect (required atm for the explosive bow feature)

Bug Fixes:
- Discord RPC should now hopefully work for everyone
- Fixed a lot of the new settings not saving after a restart
- Fixed long warnings going outside of your screen
- The fancy warp menu should now rescale a bit better if you resize your window while in the menu
- Fixed location not detecting Colosseum Arena & Duel Zone
- Fixed tickers display turning green while in the dragon's nest

And much more, full changelog on the discord...
1.8.9.1.5.0:
New Features:
- Disable Magical Soup Messages
- Power Orb Display
- Zealot Counters
- Ticker/Charges Display
- Tab Potion Timers Display
- No Arrows Left Alert
- Show "Broken" Dragon Fragments
- Turn Bow Green When Using Toxic Arrow Poison
- Birch Park Rainmaker Timer
- Combat Timer Display
- Discord Rich Presence
- Endstone Protector Display
- Fancy Warp Menu
- Legendary Sea Creature Warning
- Only Break Logs in the Park
- Slayer Boss Approach Alert
- Disable Teleport Pad Messages
- Bait List

The remainder of the changelog on the discord.
1.8.9.1.5.0-beta.17:
New: 
- Added combat timer display!
- Added simple rainmaker timer feature for the birch park 

Changes: 
- Add Chroma to more features 
- You can now use an empty item frame if it is empty while having the item frame feature enabled 
- Potion Timer improvements 

Fixes: 
- Fixed possible crash if a warning message shows while disconnected 
- Fixed feature settings moving down after toggling full screen 
- Fixed revenant armor indicator not updating sometimes 
- Fixed command help formatting and command error messages 

Please see #beta-tester-releases in the Discord for the full changelog.
1.8.9.1.5.0-beta.16:
New Features: 
 - Turn bow green when using toxic arrow poison
 - Zealot Counter: More stats!
    - Total Zealot Count Feature
	- Total Summoning Eye Count Feature
	- Average Zealots Per Eye Feature
  - Show broken dragon fragments feature

Changes:
  - Names of features in the menu now can wrap up to 2 lines. This helps with super long feature names being scaled down!
  - Removed beta tester pop up message
  - Added animation to the feature toggle in the gui (why? idk)
  - Added autocomplete to /sba command
  - Added toggle to the skyblockaddons button in the pause menu
  
Fixes:
  - Fixed ender chest coloring feature not working
  - Fixed chroma coloring not working when only 1 chorma feature was enabled
  - Fixed zealot kills not saving
1.8.9.1.5.0-beta.15: - Changed to Forge Update Checker for mod update checking
1.8.9.1.5.0-b14.2:
Changes: 
- Remove Hypixel IP check due to issues with different IPs 
Fixes: 
- Fix Roman numeral replacement not working for level 1 runes
1.8.9.1.5.0-b14.1:
Changes: 
- Sort tab effect timers is disabled as default until the rapid movement is fixed 
Fixes: 
- Fixed sort tab effect timers toggle
1.8.9.1.5.0-b14:
Fixes: 
- All Hypixel IPs should be detected now
- Add setting to toggle the sort tab effect timers feature (Sorry I forgot it when the feature was added)
1.8.9.1.5.0-b13.2:
Fixes: 
-Fixed crash when entering a single player world (Thanks MagnetiteMC!) 
-Added hypixel.io to the list of Hypixel server domains (Thanks Neuroses!)
1.8.9.1.5.0-b13.1:
Fixes: 
-Fixed crashes due to trying to get Skyblock item ID for non-Skyblock items, 
-Fixed checking for revenant armor and skeleton helmet when not on Skyblock
1.8.9.1.5.0-b13:
New: 
-Skyblock Item IDs are now shown in advanced tooltips when in developer mode 

Changes: 
-Changed Enchanted Item Blacklist to use Skyblock Item IDs 
-Improved detection for whether player is on Skyblock 

Fixes: 
-Fixed the Roman numeral replacement feature replacing the word "I" 
-Fixed the avoid placing enchanted items feature for enchanted lava buckets
1.8.9.1.5.0-b12:
New: 
-Changed to new versioning system 
-Add sub-setting to sort tab effect timers by duration 
-Add link to installation instructions when mod is opened directly instead of in Forge 
-Translations for new features (thank you to our awesome translators!) 

Fixes: 
-Fix detection of tab effects when there are two in one line 
-Fix command usage formatting
